# WKAudioFilePlayerStatus.failed

**Case**

The player can no longer play the audio because of an error. Use the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayer/error] property to get information about the error that occurred.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed
```

## Constants

- **WKAudioFilePlayerStatus.unknown**: The status of the item is unknown because the player has not yet loaded the audio file for playback.
- **WKAudioFilePlayerStatus.readyToPlay**: The player is ready to play its item.
